body_html:
Hi yaroslavvb,

I have been able to build the tensorflow .dll and it looks like the flag /wholearchive with the dinamic library is not needed.
My project is working only linking with the following dependencies:
libprotobuf.lib and tensorflow.lib.

Thank you very much for your help, it has been very useful.

Kind regards.

body:
Hi yaroslavvb,

I have been able to build the tensorflow .dll  and it looks like the flag /wholearchive with the dinamic library is not needed.  
My project is working only linking with the following dependencies:
 libprotobuf.lib and tensorflow.lib. 

Thank you very much for your help, it has been very useful.

Kind regards.
